international_experience.summary: Chetan has a rich international experience, having worked and studied in the USA, Australia, and Singapore. This has likely given him a global perspective and an understanding of diverse work cultures.

industry_sectors.summary: Chetan has worked in diverse sectors including non-profit organization management, AI and machine learning, and consulting. His experience ranges from being a Data Scientist at Move 37 to a Director of Product Management at Emergence.

education_analysis.summary: Chetan has a strong educational background in computing and computer science from reputable institutions like the National University of Singapore and Gogte Institute of Technology, Karnataka University. This has likely provided him with a solid foundation for his career in AI and data science.

value_proposition.summary: Chetan brings value in the areas of data science, product development, NLP, information retrieval, and recommender systems. His projects like LDA Wrapper, Vowpal Wabbit, and HR360 demonstrate his ability to apply his skills in practical settings.

professional_reputation.summary: Chetan is highly regarded by his peers for his mentorship, technical advice, analytic and development skills, and communication. His recommendations highlight his ability to solve complex problems and his willingness to help others.

current_interests.summary: Chetan is currently interested in AI & algorithm auditing, sustainable business models, AI in healthcare, and the impact of AI on society. He follows thought leaders and companies in these areas and is part of relevant groups.

points: His experience working in diverse sectors
His views on AI and society
His international experience and how it has shaped his career
talking_points.summary: Possible conversation starters with Chetan could include his experience working in diverse sectors, his projects and their impact, his views on AI and society, and how his international experience has shaped his career.
